remarks: Hilbert lattice join is the least upper bound (among Hilbert lattice elements) of two subspaces.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
shlub.1 $e |- A e. SH $.
shlub.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
shlub.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
shlubi $p |- ( ( A C_ C /\ B C_ C ) <-> ( A vH B ) C_ C ) $.
